main event: An observer sighted a self-luminous spherical object with red, yellow, and purple hues in Springfield, Massachusetts on March 25, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for a total duration of 12 minutes,The sighting was made from the ground and the object moved from west to northwest,The case was not submitted for investigation until January 29, 1968,The observer noted that the object did not leave any physical evidence and no photographs were taken,The investigation concluded with insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Sofia Marashovski, who reported the sighting
